encodes nothing
tests.code: it('encodes nothing', assertTemplate(['encode', 'normal', ''], ''));

tests.name: encodes something
tests.code: it('encodes something', assertTemplate(['encode', 'normal', 'my string'], 'bXkgc3RyaW5n'));

tests.name: urlencodes nothing
tests.code: it('urlencodes nothing', assertTemplate(['encode', 'url', ''], ''));

tests.name: urlencodes something
tests.code: it('urlencodes something', assertTemplate(['encode', 'url', 'hello world'], 'aGVsbG8gd29ybGQ'));

tests.name: decodes nothing
tests.code: it('decodes nothing', assertTemplate(['decode', 'normal', ''], ''));

tests.name: decodes something
tests.code: it('decodes something', assertTemplate(['decode', 'normal', 'bXkgc3RyaW5n'], 'my string'));

tests.name: urldecodes nothing
tests.code: it('urldecodes nothing', assertTemplate(['decode', 'url', ''], ''));

tests.name: urldecodes something
tests.code: it('urldecodes something', assertTemplate(['decode', 'url', 'aGVsbG8gd29ybGQ'], 'hello world'));

tests.name: fails on invalid action
tests.code: it('fails on invalid action', assertTemplateFails(['foo', 'normal', ''], 'Unsupported operation "foo". Must be encode or decode.'));

tests.name: should get cookie by name
should get cookie by name
should get cookie by name
reads from string
tests.code: it('reads from string', assertTemplate([escaped], 'Hello World!'));

tests.name: fails on missing file
tests.code: it('fails on missing file', assertTemplateFails([path.resolve('/foo')], `ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '${path.resolve('/foo')}'`));

tests.name: fails on no 2nd param
tests.code: it('fails on no 2nd param', assertTemplateFails([], 'No file selected'));

tests.name: hashes sha1
tests.code: it('hashes sha1', assertTemplate(['sha1', 'hex', 'foo'], '0beec7b5ea3f0fdbc95d0dd47f3c5bc275da8a33'));

tests.name: hashes sha256
tests.code: it('hashes sha256', assertTemplate(['sha256', 'hex', 'foo'], '2c26b46b68ffc68ff99b453c1d30413413422d706483bfa0f98a5e886266e7ae'));

tests.name: hashes md5
tests.code: it('hashes md5', assertTemplate(['md5', 'hex', 'foo'], 'acbd18db4cc2f85cedef654fccc4a4d8'));

tests.name: fails to hash invalid algorithm
tests.code: it('fails to hash invalid algorithm', assertTemplateFails(['bad', 'hex', 'foo'], 'Digest method not supported'));

tests.name: hashes to latin1
tests.code: it('hashes to latin1', assertTemplate(['md5', 'latin1', 'foo'], '¬½ÛLÂø\\íïeOÌÄ¤Ø'));

tests.name: hashes to hex
tests.code: it('hashes to hex', assertTemplate(['md5', 'hex', 'foo'], 'acbd18db4cc2f85cedef654fccc4a4d8'));

tests.name: hashes to base64
tests.code: it('hashes to base64', assertTemplate(['md5', 'base64', 'foo'], 'rL0Y20zC+Fzt72VPzMSk2A=='));

tests.name: fails to hash to invalid
tests.code: it('fails to hash to invalid', assertTemplateFails(['md5', 'bad', 'foo'], 'Invalid encoding bad. Choices are hex, latin1, base64'));

tests.name: hashes empty string
tests.code: it('hashes empty string', assertTemplate(['md5', 'hex', ''], 'd41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e'));

tests.name: hashes no string
tests.code: it('hashes no string', assertTemplate(['md5', 'hex'], 'd41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e'));

tests.name: fails to hash non string
tests.code: it('fails to hash non string', assertTemplateFails(['md5', 'hex', true], 'Cannot hash value of type "boolean"'));

tests.name: renders default ISO
tests.code: it('renders default ISO', assertTemplate([], isoRe));

tests.name: renders ISO-8601
tests.code: it('renders ISO-8601', assertTemplate(['ISO-8601'], isoRe));

tests.name: renders seconds
tests.code: it('renders seconds', assertTemplate(['seconds'], secondsRe));

tests.name: renders s
tests.code: it('renders s', assertTemplate(['s'], secondsRe));

tests.name: renders unix
tests.code: it('renders unix', assertTemplate(['unix'], secondsRe));

tests.name: renders millis
tests.code: it('renders millis', assertTemplate(['millis'], millisRe));

tests.name: renders ms
tests.code: it('renders ms', assertTemplate(['ms'], millisRe));

tests.name: fails on other
tests.code: it('fails on other', assertTemplateFails(['foo'], 'Invalid date type "foo"'));
